name: Today I decided to kill myself
name_original: Today I decided to kill myself
description:
"Today I decided to kill myself" is a game in which you play through the last moments of a person that is commiting suicide by jumping off a building.

Why would someone do that? 

What led up to this decision? 

These questions will be answered by playing through this game.

CREDITS-TEAM:

Gjemel Likaj: Programmer

Cagatay Aydin: Game Designer

Junjie Zhang: 2D Art (Game Assets)

Robin Struss: 2D Art (Cutscenes)

TOOLS:

Game Engine: Unity 2019

Asset Production: Photoshop 2019

Programming: Visual Studio (C#)

CREDITS - UNIVERSITY OF APPLIED SCIENCES EUROPE:

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Sebastian Stamm & Prof. Florian Berger
